title: Testimony War
story_summary: Amid citywide unrest, emotional stories from erased citizens fill the air. Fear campaigns spark violence as neighborhoods split. Hidden files reveal Halden once tried to save people, turning public debate. Now, trust in the BCI cracks, and the city stands on edge, waiting for what comes next.

official.headline: City Voices Rise
official.anchor_line: Public forums and broadcasts bring diverse citizen testimonies to light.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd remains committed to transparency and collective progress. Open discussion ensures resilience and societal healing.

official.headline: Neighborhood Dialogues
official.anchor_line: Debates intensify as communities consider the path to reintegration for all residents.
official.contextual_reframing: Civil engagement and rational dialogue drive Stenograd's social stability, fostering safe and orderly transition.

official.headline: Pathways Revealed
official.anchor_line: Released documents show revised leadership guided mercy within established protocols.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic self-correction strengthens unity. All changes preserve the city's enduring security and rational order.

underground.headline: Erased On Air
underground.anchor_line: Screens fill with voices the city tried to delete, exposing lives shattered by the system's invisible hand.
underground.contextual_reframing: Amnesty let ghosts speak, but abuse and silent erasure were never accidents. They were features by design.

underground.headline: Divide To Control
underground.anchor_line: Fear campaigns take over as reinstated neighbors become scapegoats and debates collapse into threats.
underground.contextual_reframing: A manufactured panic keeps us busy fighting each other. The Directorate calls it public order. We know better.

underground.headline: Halden's Last Secret
underground.anchor_line: Leaked files show Halden cherry-picked survivors, playing god while the rest vanished into data blackholes.
underground.contextual_reframing: Redemption is a story for the living. For every 'saved,' dozens more were ghosts by algorithm. Never trust the machine to judge a life.
